definition: to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

sentences.english: If I'm watching TV, I can fast-forward through commercials.
sentences.chinese: 看电视的时候，我可以通过快进按钮跳过广告。

sentences.english: There is an upstairs bar for guest.
sentences.chinese: 让我们快进酒吧喝一杯吧。

sentences.english: Brilliant like 007, we are knowledgeable in massive area, and keep learning.
sentences.chinese: 以007为榜样，永远博学多才而又善学快进。

definition: The End (appearing at the end of a movie etc)
to quit watching a TV series
fragment (of speech etc)/extract (from book etc)/episode (of story etc)
(of an actor) to inhabit one's role/to become the character/(of an audience) to get involved in the drama
opening titles (of movie)/leader (blank film at the beginning and end of a reel)
(of an actor) to disengage from the performance (e.g. after the show ends)/(of an audience) to lose interest in the performance
the boring part of something (film, show, etc.) where a bathroom break can be taken
